Air_Bomb.help: You have been knocked back by the explosion and are on fire.

Assault.help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are partially resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Granite_Armor.help: When you activate this power, you are transformed into a massive bulk of unyielding Granite. Your incredible mass makes you almost completely invulnerable and resistant to most effects. However, you also become quite heavy, cannot fly, your attack and movement speed are Slowed and you do less damage. Granite Armor also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs.Cannot be active at the same time as other Armors in this set, Fly powers, Sprint, Super Speed, or Jump powers. Recharge: Slow
Granite_Armor.attackerHit: Your Granite Armor has made you practically invulnerable!

Earths_Embrace.help: You are so connected to the Earth, you can draw upon its power to add to your own health. Activating this power increases your maximum Hit Points, and grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
Earths_Embrace.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Mud_Pots.help: While this power is active, you draw upon the geothermal power of the Earth to create a bubbling pool of hot mud around yourself. All foes in melee range will become snared and entrapped in the mud, Immobilizing some and slowing others. The boiling heat from Mud Pots also deals some damage over time to the snared foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Mud_Pots.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize, -SPD
Mud_Pots.targetHelp: The Mud Pots are burning you and reducing your Running speed. You may be immobilized, as well.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Quicksand.help: Your Running speed, Jump height and Defense are reduced by the Quicksand.

Stone_Prison.help: Immobilizes a single target within an earthy formation and deals some Smashing damage over time. Some more resilient foes may require multiple attacks to Immobilize. Stone Prison can also reduce a target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Stone_Prison.targetHelp: You are being crushed by a Stone Prison. You are immobile and cannot fly. Your Defenses are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

Fossilize.help: Encases a single target within solid stone. The stone slowly crushes the victim, dealing Smashing damage. The Fossilized victim is held helpless and unable to defend himself. Damage, Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Fossilize.targetHelp: You have been Fossilized and are held. Your Defenses are reduced.

Gloom.targetHelp: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Twilight_Grasp.help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.targetHelp: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your Accuracy and Damage potential.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Night_Fall.help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Night_Fall.targetHelp: Night Fall has reduced your Accuracy.

Fearsome_Stare.help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.targetHelp: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

Petrifying_Gaze.targetHelp: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!

Life_Drain.targetHelp: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Dark_Servant.help: Summons a Dark Servant to your aid. The Dark Servant possesses an assortment of dark powers to weaken your foes. The summoned entity is not a willing servant, and it is only your power that binds it in this realm. The Dark Servant can be buffed and healed. Recharge: Very Long
Dark_Servant.shortHelp: Summon Dark Servant: Ranged Debuff Special

Blackstar.help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing affected foes' Accuracy. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Blackstar.targetHelp: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Blackstar.

Quickness.help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Elude.help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.targetHelp: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.attackerHit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit, however, you are too preoccupied to attack foes or assist his allies.
